Groups

Group a series of buttons together on a single line with the button group. Use class -group to create it.

Global variables

$form-fieldset-border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.2) !global $form-fieldset-padding-vertical: $base-line-height-comp !global $form-fieldset-padding-horizontal: $base-line-height-comp !global $form-legend-padding: 7px !global

When screen resolution become less then 992px, then all groups become _justify_.
